Philip Polkinghorne murder trial live updates: Paramedics recall surgeon’s demeanour after wife Pauline Hanna’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-live-updates-paramedics-recall-surgeons-demeanour-after-wife-pauline-hannas-death/HWD77AAX45GXBN5RJJKPW7DCEM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-live-updates-paramedics-recall-surgeons-demeanour-after-wife-pauline-hannas-death/HWD77AAX45GXBN5RJJKPW7DCEM/ Craig KapitanThe eye surgeon is accused of having staged his wife's murder as a suicide. Photo / Michael Craig
